# üöÄ Agent-Company Dashboard - Unified Strategic Roadmap
**Generated by**: Multi-Agent Collaborative Planning Session  
**Date**: 2026-01-01  
**Status**: Active Development  

---

## üìä Executive Summary

Based on collaborative input from all 32 agents, this roadmap defines the strategic direction for the Agent-Company Dashboard - a real-time visualization and management platform for autonomous AI agent teams.

### üéØ Vision
Create the world's first **fully autonomous software development company** where AI agents collaborate, plan, code, test, and deploy applications with minimal human intervention.

---

## üèóÔ∏è Phase 1: Foundation (Weeks 1-2)
**Lead**: Architecture Agent, Database Architect  
**Status**: üü° In Progress

### Core Infrastructure
- [x] 32-agent swarm architecture deployed
- [x] MCP (Model Context Protocol) integration
- [x] Python-Node.js bridge communication
- [ ] **Centralized state management** (Redis/PostgreSQL)
- [ ] **Event-driven messaging system** (RabbitMQ/Kafka)
- [ ] **Agent registry with health monitoring**

### Database Schema
**Owner**: Database Architect
```sql
-- Core Tables
- agents (id, name, role, status, skills, mcps)
- tasks (id, type, description, assigned_to, status, priority)
- projects (id, name, description, created_by, status)
- communications (id, from_agent, to_agent, message, timestamp)
- artifacts (id, task_id, type, path, content)
```

### API Architecture
**Owner**: Backend Engineer
- RESTful API (Express.js)
- WebSocket for real-time updates
- GraphQL for complex queries
- Authentication & Authorization (JWT)

**Deliverables**:
- ‚úÖ Basic API endpoints created
- üîÑ Database migrations
- üîÑ WebSocket server setup
- üîÑ Authentication system

## üé® Phase 2: User Experience (Weeks 2-3)
**Lead**: Design Agent, Frontend Engineer, Accessibility Agent

### Design System
**Owner**: Design Agent

**Color Palette** (Dark Mode First):
- Primary: `#2B81FF` (Agent Blue)
- Success: `#10b981` (Emerald)
- Warning: `#f59e0b` (Amber)
- Danger: `#dc2626` (Red)
- Background: `#0f172a` (Slate 900)
- Surface: `#1e293b` (Slate 800)

**Typography**:
- Headings: Inter (Bold)
- Body: Inter (Regular)
- Code: JetBrains Mono

**Components**:
- Agent Card (status, skills, activity)
- Task Kanban Board
- Real-time Activity Feed
- Chat Interface
- Metrics Dashboard

### Core Features
**Owner**: Frontend Engineer

1. **Agent Matrix View** ü§ñ
   - Grid/List view of all 32 agents
   - Real-time status indicators (idle/working/error)
   - Skill tags and categories
   - Click to view agent details

2. **Task Management** üìã
   - Kanban board (Backlog ‚Üí In Progress ‚Üí Review ‚Üí Done)
   - Drag-and-drop task assignment
   - Priority levels and deadlines
   - Task dependencies visualization

3. **Communication Hub** üí¨
   - Agent-to-agent message log
   - Direct chat with specific agents
   - Broadcast messages to teams
   - Conversation threading

4. **Project Dashboard** üìä
   - Active projects overview
   - Progress tracking
   - Resource allocation
   - Timeline visualization

5. **Code Artifacts Viewer** üìÅ
   - Generated files browser
   - Syntax highlighting
   - Diff viewer for changes
   - Download/export functionality

**Deliverables**:
- ‚úÖ Planning session component created
- ‚úÖ Dashboard visualization component created
- ‚úÖ Authentication UI components created
- üîÑ Agent Matrix implementation
- üîÑ Kanban Board implementation
- üîÑ Real-time WebSocket integration

## üîí Phase 3: Security & Quality (Weeks 3-4)
**Lead**: Security Agent, QA Agent, Code Review Agent

### Security Requirements
**Owner**: Security Agent

- [ ] **Authentication**: JWT with refresh tokens
- [ ] **Authorization**: Role-based access control (Admin, Developer, Viewer)
- [ ] **API Security**: Rate limiting, CORS, input validation
- [ ] **Data Encryption**: At rest (AES-256) and in transit (TLS 1.3)
- [ ] **Vulnerability Scanning**: Weekly automated scans
- [ ] **Penetration Testing**: Monthly security audits
- [ ] **OWASP Top 10 Compliance**

### Testing Strategy
**Owner**: QA Agent

**Unit Tests** (Jest):
- Agent logic functions
- API endpoints
- React components
- Target: 80% coverage

**Integration Tests** (Playwright):
- Agent communication flows
- Task assignment workflows
- Real-time updates
- Target: Critical paths covered

**E2E Tests** (Playwright):
- Complete user journeys
- Multi-agent collaboration scenarios
- Performance under load

**Accessibility Tests**:
- WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
- Screen reader compatibility
- Keyboard navigation

**Deliverables**:
- üîÑ Security audit report
- üîÑ Test suite implementation
- üîÑ CI/CD pipeline with automated testing

---

## üöÄ Phase 4: DevOps & Deployment (Week 4)
**Lead**: DevOps Agent, Monitoring Agent

### Infrastructure
**Owner**: DevOps Agent

**Containerization**:
```dockerfile
# Multi-stage build
- Node.js backend (Express)
- Python agents (FastAPI bridges)
- React frontend (Vite)
- PostgreSQL database
- Redis cache
```

**Orchestration** (Docker Compose ‚Üí Kubernetes):
- Auto-scaling based on agent load
- Health checks and self-healing
- Rolling updates with zero downtime

**CI/CD Pipeline** (GitHub Actions):
```yaml
1. Code push ‚Üí Lint & Format
2. Run tests (Unit + Integration)
3. Build Docker images
4. Deploy to staging
5. Run E2E tests
6. Deploy to production (manual approval)
```

### Monitoring & Observability
**Owner**: Monitoring Agent

- **Metrics**: Prometheus + Grafana
  - Agent response times
  - Task completion rates
  - System resource usage
  - Error rates

- **Logging**: ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana)
  - Centralized log aggregation
  - Agent activity logs
  - Error tracking

- **Alerting**: PagerDuty/Slack
  - Agent failures
  - Performance degradation
  - Security incidents

**Deliverables**:
- üîÑ Docker Compose setup
- üîÑ GitHub Actions workflows
- üîÑ Monitoring dashboards
- üîÑ Alerting rules

## üìû Communication Protocol

### Daily Standups (Automated)
- **Time**: 09:00 UTC
- **Format**: Each agent reports via `/api/standup`
  - What I completed yesterday
  - What I'm working on today
  - Any blockers

### Weekly Planning (Automated)
- **Time**: Monday 10:00 UTC
- **Format**: Project Manager facilitates
  - Review previous week
  - Plan current week
  - Adjust priorities

### Ad-hoc Collaboration
- Agents can request help via `/api/collaborate`
- Project Manager coordinates cross-functional work
